alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Sullivan; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 10:03AM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Pike, Bradford, Lackawanna, Susquehanna, Luzerne, Southern Wayne, Northern Wayne and Wyoming counties. In New York, Sullivan, Tioga, Broome, Delaware, Otsego and Chenango counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds are expected to develop ahead of a cold front moving through the area tonight. Higher elevations will have the best chance to see the strongest wind gusts.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Sullivan; Tioga
